nodes.bodyText: Wouldn't users want to be able to be notified when they run out of energy completely?

nodes.bodyText: I'll set this one to not trigger when the value is set to 100 then. I had it like this because I wanted it to be consistent with the other notifications, but I agree this is better.

nodes.bodyText:
These names seem very strange, since they're backwards from what they actually do. They're basically only ever checked as if (!notify) notifier.notify();
Instead, flip the values and checks for these booleans so they start as false and trigger notifications when they're true.
I was following the way prayers and hitpoints was implemented, but I switched them around and made the var names a bit more descriptive.
